TopicTitle: The things you find when bored...

Articles.Content:
I didn\'t know about KSP until about 12 hours ago at the time of writing this. However as I typed in \'latest space sims\' into google, a heading caught my eye... \'Kerbal Space Program\'. I click on it, go to the website, watch the youtube video and 60 seconds later I\'m downloading it. While obviously still an alpha, this game has impressed me. Something easy to pick up, hard to put down. Look forward to the implementation of more features but other than that, well done dev team.

Cailean.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!
